pages.text: Surviving in space is no walk in the park; to simply stay in space, you will need the oxygen to breathe and the protection of space's chilly grasp.$(br2)The best equipment for space are spacesuits!

To withstand the harsh boiling environments of Venus and Mercury, it is severely recommended to upgrade your spacesuit to netherite level using a smithing table.$(br2)It may also protect you against other factors that are not part of the environment.
